feed.title: Additional BIPs related to other proposals

entry.title: Additional BIPs related to other proposals
entry.summary: Chris has created three additional BIPs (Bitcoin Improvement Proposals) related to his recent proposals. These BIPs can be accessed through the links provided on Github. The first link is associated with notification, the second one with moderation and the third one with Web of Trust (WoT). Chris has requested feedback, questions or comments regarding these proposals.
